page.title: 14THE ANGLICAN CHURCH
page.content: Tattershall and Coningsby are a combined benefice within the Lincoln Diocese under Father Bernard Parsons.An ordained non-stipendiary priest assists him as do six lay ministers. Father Bernard's role is that of an 'enabler' in a teaching ministry and the pastoral side of his vocation hasaltered dramatically in recent years as the greater mobility of society in general has precluded house calls on his parishioners but he stresses that he is often contacted personally by them on social and personal matters. He has close contact with the state run social services. He has close ties with two local primary schools,one of which runs a weekly Christian Children's Club which has led to renewed enthusiasm and participation in church activities from youngsters in the parish.
